Package org.lwjgl.bgfx

Class BGFXTextureInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.system.Pointer.Default
      • org.lwjgl.system.Struct
        • org.lwjgl.bgfx.BGFXTextureInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, org.lwjgl.system.NativeResource, org.lwjgl.system.Pointer

    public class BGFXTextureInfo
extends org.lwjgl.system.Struct
implements org.lwjgl.system.NativeResource
    Texture info.

    Member documentation

    • format – texture format. One of:
      TEXTURE_FORMAT_A8TEXTURE_FORMAT_BC1TEXTURE_FORMAT_BC2TEXTURE_FORMAT_BC3
      TEXTURE_FORMAT_BC4TEXTURE_FORMAT_BC5TEXTURE_FORMAT_BC6HTEXTURE_FORMAT_BC7
      TEXTURE_FORMAT_BGRA8TEXTURE_FORMAT_D0S8TEXTURE_FORMAT_D16TEXTURE_FORMAT_D16F
      TEXTURE_FORMAT_D24TEXTURE_FORMAT_D24FTEXTURE_FORMAT_D24S8TEXTURE_FORMAT_D32
      TEXTURE_FORMAT_D32FTEXTURE_FORMAT_ETC1TEXTURE_FORMAT_ETC2TEXTURE_FORMAT_ETC2A
      TEXTURE_FORMAT_ETC2A1TEXTURE_FORMAT_PTC12TEXTURE_FORMAT_PTC12ATEXTURE_FORMAT_PTC14
      TEXTURE_FORMAT_PTC14ATEXTURE_FORMAT_PTC22TEXTURE_FORMAT_PTC24TEXTURE_FORMAT_R1
      TEXTURE_FORMAT_R11G11B10FTEXTURE_FORMAT_R16TEXTURE_FORMAT_R16FTEXTURE_FORMAT_R16I
      TEXTURE_FORMAT_R16STEXTURE_FORMAT_R16UTEXTURE_FORMAT_R32FTEXTURE_FORMAT_R32I
      TEXTURE_FORMAT_R32UTEXTURE_FORMAT_R5G6B5TEXTURE_FORMAT_R8TEXTURE_FORMAT_R8I
      TEXTURE_FORMAT_R8STEXTURE_FORMAT_R8UTEXTURE_FORMAT_RG16TEXTURE_FORMAT_RG16F
      TEXTURE_FORMAT_RG16ITEXTURE_FORMAT_RG16STEXTURE_FORMAT_RG16UTEXTURE_FORMAT_RG32F
      TEXTURE_FORMAT_RG32ITEXTURE_FORMAT_RG32UTEXTURE_FORMAT_RG8TEXTURE_FORMAT_RG8I
      TEXTURE_FORMAT_RG8STEXTURE_FORMAT_RG8UTEXTURE_FORMAT_RGB10A2TEXTURE_FORMAT_RGB5A1
      TEXTURE_FORMAT_RGB8TEXTURE_FORMAT_RGB8ITEXTURE_FORMAT_RGB8STEXTURE_FORMAT_RGB8U
      TEXTURE_FORMAT_RGB9E5FTEXTURE_FORMAT_RGBA16TEXTURE_FORMAT_RGBA16FTEXTURE_FORMAT_RGBA16I
      TEXTURE_FORMAT_RGBA16STEXTURE_FORMAT_RGBA16UTEXTURE_FORMAT_RGBA32FTEXTURE_FORMAT_RGBA32I
      TEXTURE_FORMAT_RGBA32UTEXTURE_FORMAT_RGBA4TEXTURE_FORMAT_RGBA8TEXTURE_FORMAT_RGBA8I
      TEXTURE_FORMAT_RGBA8STEXTURE_FORMAT_RGBA8UTEXTURE_FORMAT_UNKNOWNTEXTURE_FORMAT_UNKNOWN_DEPTH
    • storageSize – total amount of bytes required to store texture
    • width – texture width
    • height – texture height
    • depth – texture depth
    • numLayers – number of layers in texture array
    • numMips – number of MIP maps
    • bitsPerPixel – format bits per pixel
    • cubeMap – texture is cubemap

    Layout

    struct bgfx_texture_info_t {
    bgfx_texture_format_t format;
    uint32_t storageSize;
    uint16_t width;
    uint16_t height;
    uint16_t depth;
    uint16_t numLayers;
    uint8_t numMips;
    uint8_t bitsPerPixel;
    bool cubeMap;
}

    • Constructor Detail

      • BGFXTextureInfo

        public BGFXTextureInfo(java.nio.ByteBuffer container)
        Creates a BGFXTextureInfo instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

        The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
